reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 577/98: EXEMPTION - DELORO MINE SITE
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 577/98: EXEMPTION - DELORO MINE SITE
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Protection Act   Loi sur la protection de l’environnement

content.content: 1. Section 20.15 of the Act does not apply to an application by the Ministry of the Environment for an environmental compliance approval in respect of the use, operation, establishment, alteration, enlargement or extension of one or more waste disposal sites at the Deloro Mine Site in the County of Hastings if the waste was produced at the Deloro Mine Site or is otherwise related to the Deloro Mine Site.  O. Reg. 577/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 244/11, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Section 20.15 of the Act does not apply to an application by the Ministry of the Environment for an environmental compliance approval in respect of the use, operation, establishment, alteration, enlargement or extension of one or more waste disposal sites at the Deloro Mine Site in the County of Hastings if the waste was produced at the Deloro Mine Site or is otherwise related to the Deloro Mine Site.  O. Reg. 577/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 244/11, s. 1.
